newsitem.title: USA: Kuhlman stake held by Vinik group.
newsitem.headline: Kuhlman stake held by Vinik group.

text.p: A group led by Boston investor Jeffery Vinik said Monday it holds a 5.2 percent stake in Kuhlman Corp, or 709,900 common shares.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 364,900 common shares bought between December 17, 1996, and February 19, 1997, at prices ranging from $17.7854 to $22.71 per share.
Kuhlman, based in Savannah, Ga., is a holding company involved in manufacturing and marketing electric transformers for utilities, and springs and metal products.
